dark_age.3: Build 2 houses, then send your first 6 villagers to sheep.
dark_age.6: Now send the next 4 villagers to wood.
dark_age.10: Now send the next villager to lure the boar.
dark_age.11: The next 5 villagers should go to berries. Build 2 houses with the next villager.
dark_age.14: Now use one of your villagers underneath the town center to lure the second boar.
dark_age.16: Now send the next 2 villagers to boar.
dark_age.17: Also move 2 villager from the boar to build farms.
dark_age.18: Now send more villagers to wood, until you have 9 villagers split between 2 lumber camps.
dark_age.23: Now send the last 3 villagers to gold. Also start moving villagers from sheep to make farms.
dark_age.26: Now research loom, and then click Feudal with 27 population.

feudal_age.26: Now build a market and a blacksmith and send te next 2 villagers to wood. You should then be able to click up to the Castle age.
feudal_age.28: Now start moving villagers from berries, so that you have at least 14 villagers on wood. Research both double-bit axe and horse collar.

timer.10: As the sheep run out, continue moving villagers to farms until you have 8 farms.
